artist: Painter: After David Teniers, the Younger; Engraver: Thomas Goff Lupton; Publisher: W. B. Cooke
description: Two men standing on a road; one man pointing to a third seated on the ground next to a rock, sleeping; a couple seated at right ; man with arm around shoulders of woman; to dwellings at right; trees in distance
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

title: Dutch Boors
